tweets.text: One hour sleep yet again it was different smell it stripped my chest and made me throw up that's after I already passed out my son and dog were struggling breath got me scared for our lives https://t.co/Pt7FTBGDWO
#stopthestink What exactly are they doing at night? When are the EA going to investigate what they are doing at night? We’ve two issues here, the daily stench and the over night gassing.

Yet again woken at 3am putrid gases in my bedroom, only way to get back to sleep was with a pillow over my head #StopTheStink help us breathe again @DefraGovUK @PHE_uk @MattHancock @EnvAgency @JamesBevanEA @BorisJohnson @StinkStopthe @Cap_it_off

tweets.text: https://t.co/at5v3KeWqt billowing around. Poisonous corrosive gas filling homes on a massive scale. Thousands of people monitoring wind direction daily to plan their lives around it @StinkStopthe @envagency #stopthestink https://t.co/poVLlhCrQm
@EnvAgency what will it take for you to take action? Who can help us?? #stopthestink
How are we still alive do we have to die before something is done https://t.co/AvJdAE9FXc

@DrMickSalt @PHE_uk @EnvAgency Is this another example of @ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgencyMids not taking the most complained about Landfill site seriously? I thought I could not lose anymore confidence in the EA but It’s failure after failure  @StinkStopthe #stopthestink

Just when you think the @EnvAgency are starting to listen there is yet more evidence of lip service @ClareDinnisEA . At this rate we will have to come to the Bristol Head Offices to see you - how else will stop you from taking the mickey out of us?! #stopthestink @StinkStopthe https://t.co/BQRJrvYO8H

@ClareDinnisEA @PHE_uk @EnvAgency @NBCEnvironment @RedIndustries2 @MattHancock  Did you know that @StinkStopthe  are fund raising to buy air purifiers for residents living near #WalleysQuarry ? Yep. In 2021. Because people can't breathe clean air in their homes #stopthestink

Pathetic regulation of the landfill, pathetic management of what is essentially a major incident but deliberately not being identified as one & pathetic PR skills @EnvAgency @PHE_EoEngland .  Sack the lot & start again @BorisJohnson @MattHancock #stopthestink https://t.co/cgJPaRXe7K

"The Government now offering to place a duty on water companies to publish data they already hold, but only on an annual basis, is no offer at all. That has been the law since 2004."

tweets.text: It's nearly 9pm and I've accidently left a window open upstairs...just ran up to close it before the @RedIndustries2 gas hits us. @EnvAgency do you plan your life around being gassed by H2S? Asking for a friend... #stopthestink #landfill https://t.co/1ZkqqDuDCW

That’s what I thought but @PHE_EoEngland issued a statement saying there was no long term health effects & very little else or substance. We are doing our own quantitative health study now & will be sending them a report @MattHancock #stopthestink @StinkStopthe https://t.co/bMzC9yqNoQ

tweets.text: You know the landfill fumes are a problem when a gent 5 miles away says they’re horrific. Only a matter of time before the health effects spread further @ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgency @PHE_EoEngland Your strategy to play this down & gas light our town isn’t working #stopthestink https://t.co/WOuBPHkCDo

Our @Plastic_EU #PreventingPlasticPollution colleagues from the @EnvAgency are co-hosting a free biz event on Mon 19 April. Focusing on #Solent biz/orgs but others welcome to join online to discuss plastic reduction/best practice. Book via https://t.co/OR8DCTfSGR https://t.co/rZZLLIY9tU
Exactly the same for me @EnvAgency. Looked to be clearing just after midnight so opened a window to clear the bedroom, but back again after 10 minutes 😔 #stopthestink https://t.co/sTl1ddHXg5

@PHE_EoEngland @EnvAgency @ClareDinnisEA Shame on you! A lady vomiting & a baby screaming at the wall of gas that hit them. Shame on you #stopthestink @Cap_it_off @StinkStopthe https://t.co/99ZuhkX95z

Can these please be verified? Can we be told what it is in the air we have to breathe to live, is that same air killing us slowly? #StopTheStink @PHE_uk @MattHancock @EnvAgency @JamesBevanEA @BorisJohnson @StinkStopthe @DefraGovUK @Cap_it_off https://t.co/ExFGLDd7eM

Suddenly just upstream of this structure at Lee Farm, Lee Brook became a beautiful #chalkstream again with pools of Dace. What could be causing the dead zone for the mile downstream? @theriverstrust IsMyRiverFitToPlay app lists no sewage outflow here
#Freckenham #WestSuffolk 
4/7 https://t.co/FWeCGAtBHj

Day 3 still in the fallout https://t.co/jKI8chWl3j it sunny outside?It’s very quiet,I can smell it. Forgot to pack the ibuprofen the stink headaches are bad.Will you let me know when it’s safe to come me out @ClareDinnisEA @NewsNBC @EnvAgency @PHE_uk @StinkStopthe #stopthestink https://t.co/4oNpDA0krr

Help us before something unrecoverable happens we’re not asking for much just the basic human right of fresh air @MattHancock @PHE_uk @EnvAgency @JamesBevanEA @BorisJohnson @StinkStopthe @DefraGovUK @Cap_it_off https://t.co/djtWnijAE0

tweets.text: @TheFloodHub Can you provide me two information? Is there anything published about the hydraulic performance of the revetment shown in this image? And where is the project site located?

Day 2 in the ‘fallout’ room HELP! @EnvAgency & @PHE_uk the @RedIndustries2 Walleys landfill stench attack is everywhere. How many complaints now? @ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgencyMids @AaronBell4NUL @NewsNBC see advice for casualties @StinkStopthe #stopthestink https://t.co/MIwl9I26Qe

@PJennings88 @RiverChess We’re seeing exactly the same thing at the @amwellmagna 

Someone has clearly been spending a lot of time recently dumping lots of cr*p into our rivers. I wonder who? https://t.co/MmKReZCDC1

Had the LOVELIEST day in #Buxton today to breathe FRESH AIR and bring home water we feel safe to drink. It is CRIMINAL that our home town of NUL @NewsNBC no longer feels SAFE. @EnvAgency @EnvAgencyMids @ClareDinnisEA @JamesBevanEA @DefraGovUK @StinkStopthe #stopthestink https://t.co/MewAHIazvg

tweets.text: The new flood risk zone  👇right is much smaller than the original zone 👇left. This sudden & unexplained reduction followed a planning application for a site within the original flood zone. As a result of an  @EnvAgency agreed change 700+more homes can be built on the low coast! https://t.co/SQMNxBI92s

Read our latest update for #WalleysQuarry landfill site here 👉https://t.co/o558iAVicn

We're visiting the surrounding area on an almost daily basis to carry out odour amenity checks. We're also continuing to inspect the site, including monitoring the progress of the capping. https://t.co/FsLQlvsU0f

Risk to health - many parents are frightened what this may mean for the long term health of their children @MattHancock Can you & @PHE_EoEngland address the town as a matter of urgency please? @BBCPanorama #stopthestink @StinkStopthe https://t.co/8PWAahQD08

tweets.text: @AliDriverUK walleys quarry landfill Newcastle under Lyme poisonous gases invading our homes making us ill, hydrogen sulphide levels way above WHO safe Levs, lots of illness, can't sleep, please help #StoptheStink
@prometheusgreen walleys quarry landfill toxic gases seeping into homes, making us ill, night after night, environment/public health disaster in Newcastle under Lyme, please help #StoptheStink

@ShellenbergerMD Newcastle u Lyme feels like an apocalypse right now, toxic gases seep into our homes every night , 1000s residents robbed of clean air, can't sleep, headaches, can't breathe, sick kids, please help #StoptheStink

I’ve just reported to EA saying it’s been a different smell this weekend more of a chemical smell, the are we have to breathe in to live is pure chemical how is that right? #StopTheStink @MattHancock @PHE_uk @EnvAgency @JamesBevanEA @BorisJohnson @StinkStopthe @Cap_it_off https://t.co/x07oz6YSgX

tweets.text: @EnvAgency data shows #whalleysquarry air monitoring so far has breached @WHO limit for health and is far higher than any other landfill monitored. Landfill is still taking waste. No action from @PHE_uk. When will this health hazard stop? #stopthestink https://t.co/rvQEg7tGh8

@acrylicloveart @SianieRoo @RedIndustries2 @EnvAgencyMids @PHE_WestMids @AaronBell4NUL @MattHancock Yes. We will not shop here. We drive out first thing Sat am and stay away as much as possible at weekends. It will become a ghost town courtesy of @RedIndustries2

@waiterich walleys quarry landfill poisoning us in our homes with its badly managed toxic gases, please can you help us get this polluter shut down, we are being robbed of quality of life, no sleep for 10 nights now, please advise us #StoptheStink
This is shocking I carnt stop throwing up I passed out and my son struggling so bad he ready for ambulance but he not going to that stinky hospital https://t.co/tyz3rOmJ80

I am astonished now that we have to even ask for clean air let alone scream and shout and demand it. The @EnvAgency @PHE_EoEngland & government @MattHancock @BorisJohnson are currently standing aside and watching our kids get gassed in their beds. @StinkStopthe #stopthesti https://t.co/hlo4bBBGnQ
@Clive12077715 @TerriDeakin1 @HelenVi00175623 Shutting the landfill & cleaning it up is what the @EnvAgency hasn’t tried!! @MattHancock
